ValidationRule.description: Unified cases cannot be placed in "Monitoring" queue if it is already closed. Only open unified cases are expected to be placed in monitoring queue and should be moved out when they are closed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsClosed, CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "Unified"), OR( AND(ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Monitoring")), AND(ISCHANGED(OwnerId), (Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "UnifiedCustomerServiceMonitoringQueue")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case is closed and cannot be moved to Monitoring queue.
